trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kakkuu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The kakkuu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: When in contact with a web, the kakkuu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The kakkuu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kakkuu makes a Web Snare attack, uses Reel, and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Reel
entries: The kakkuu pulls each creature within 60 feet of itself that is {@condition grappled} by its Web Snare up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

action.name: Web Snare
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 13}). While {@condition grappled}, the target also has the {@condition restrained} condition. A web snare grappling a creature can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 10 hit points; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).
